creator: Mones
descriptionHtml: Mones is a new generation P2E RPG game where you not only enjoy the exciting gameplay, but also connect with other players through social features and earn long-term profits from a player-driven economy.
descriptionShort: Join Tommy's troop of heroes, uncover the secret behind the devil gem.
title: Mones

creator: Mones
descriptionHtml:
Mones is a new generation MMORPG game where you not only enjoy the exciting gameplay, but also connect with other players through social features and earn long-term profits from a player-driven economy called Play-Own-Earn.
With the tagline: Here for the Play-Own-Earn revolution, Mones has compelling competitive advantages compared with other games:
- Superior game design with high-quality 3D graphics & gameplay.
- Social-driven features.
- Next generation Play-Own-Earn with a player-driven economy.
- Free to play.

Target users:
Mid & Hard-core Mobile RPG gamers, web3 game players, game lovers who are looking for an attractive and strategic game are Mones’s target users.

Key game features:
- Guild feature: Declaration of war, Guild war, Kingdom Rule, Tournament
- Friend request to visit other players’ profile
- Messaging to chat with users worldwide
- Referral program for both promoters and referees to earn passive income
- DAO governance to vote in Mones ecosystem and unlock special game modes as well as earn special prize pools.

8 game modes: PVP (Arena), PVE (Advanture), Twin Towers, Dungeon, Raid, Death Temple, Road of trial, Invasion
Players form their team strategically to join game modes and fight in battles. Each hero has different powers depending on their class and rarity. Mones is not only a role-playing game as other gamefi projects of this genre, it also has “time-stop” that allows players to interfere in the game by freely controlling the actions of heroes according to their tactics.

Character types & rarity:
- 3 types: Hero, Equipment, Raw mateiral
- 6 rarities: B, A, B+, R, SR, SR+
descriptionShort: Immerse yourself in a fantasy MMORPG world!

title: Mones

container.value: Tam Hợp, Bình Xuyên, Vĩnh Phúc

creator: Mones
descriptionHtml:
Mones is a new generation RPG game where you not only enjoy the exciting gameplay, but also connect with other players through social features and earn long-term profits from a player-driven economy.
Mones has compelling competitive advantages compared with other games:
- Superior game design with high-quality 3D graphics & gameplay.
- Social-driven features such as finding friends of your life and messaging them.
- More than 200 gorgeous heroes and equipments.
- Free heroes to play.
- Epic combats with auto play system and 8 attractive game modes.
Key game features:
- Guild feature: Declaration of war, Guild war, Kingdom Rule, Tournament.
- Friend request to visit other players’ profile.
- Messaging to chat with users worldwide.
- Affiliate program for both promoters and referees to earn passive income.
- Auto combats and various in-game assets including heroes, equipments, gold, stamina, ticket.
- Summon new powerful heroes and craft mythical equipments.
8 game modes: PVP (Arena), PVE (Advanture), Twin Towers, Dungeon, Raid, Death Temple, Road of trial, Invasion
Players form their team strategically to join game modes and fight in battles. Each hero has different powers depending on their class and rarity. Mones is not only a role-playing game as other gamefi projects of this genre, it also has “time-stop” that allows players to interfere in the game by freely controlling the actions of heroes according to their tactics.
Character types & rarity:
- 3 types: Hero, Equipment, Raw mateiral
- 6 rarities: B, A, B+, R, SR, SR+
Find us here:
Website: https://mones.io
Discord: https://discord.gg/monesnfts
Telegram: https://t.me/mones_chat
Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/monesgames/
Blog: http://blog.mones.io/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MonesNFTs
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MonesNFTs
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@monesgame
descriptionShort: Immerse yourself in a fantasy RPG world!

title: Mones

container.value: Tam Hợp, Bình Xuyên, Vĩnh Phúc

creator: Mones
descriptionHtml:
Mones is a new generation RPG game where you not only enjoy the exciting gameplay, but also connect with other players through social features and earn long-term profits from a player-driven economy.
Mones has compelling competitive advantages compared with other games:
- Superior game design with high-quality 3D graphics & gameplay.
- Social-driven features such as finding friends of your life and messaging them.
- More than 200 gorgeous heroes and equipments.
- Free heroes to play.
- Epic combats with auto play system and 8 attractive game modes.
Key game features:
- Guild feature: Declaration of war, Guild war, Kingdom Rule, Tournament.
- Friend request to visit other players’ profile.
- Messaging to chat with users worldwide.
- Affiliate program for both promoters and referees to earn passive income.
- Auto combats and various in-game assets including heroes, equipments, gold, stamina, ticket.
- Summon new powerful heroes and craft mythical equipments.
8 game modes: PVP (Arena), PVE (Advanture), Twin Towers, Dungeon, Raid, Death Temple, Road of trial, Invasion
Players form their team strategically to join game modes and fight in battles. Each hero has different powers depending on their class and rarity. Mones is not only a role-playing game as other gamefi projects of this genre, it also has “time-stop” that allows players to interfere in the game by freely controlling the actions of heroes according to their tactics.
Character types & rarity:
- 3 types: Hero, Equipment, Raw mateiral
- 6 rarities: B, A, B+, R, SR, SR+
Find us here:
